MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​NamespaceDoc
internal static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​NamespaceDoc

Namespace containing all the most commonly used classes for MoonSharp operation.  When in doubt, refer to Script and DynValue classes as starting points.

MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​CoreLib.​NamespaceDoc
internal static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​CoreLib.​NamespaceDoc

Namespace containing the implementation of the Lua standard library, as MoonSharp modules.  There's seldom the need to access these classes directly.

MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​CoreLib.​IO.​NamespaceDoc
internal static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​CoreLib.​IO.​NamespaceDoc

Namespace containing userdata classes for the 'io' module

MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Debugging.​NamespaceDoc
internal static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Debugging.​NamespaceDoc

Namespace containing classes used to support debuggers

MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Diagnostics.​NamespaceDoc
internal static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Diagnostics.​NamespaceDoc

Namespace containing classes used to support self diagnostics (e.g. performance counters)

MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​NamespaceDoc
internal static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​NamespaceDoc

Namespace containing classes used to customize and support advanced interoperations between scripts and CLR code.

MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​LuaStateInterop.​NamespaceDoc
internal static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​LuaStateInterop.​NamespaceDoc

Namespace containing classes used to provide a minimal support for porting code based on the classic "LuaState" model (e.g. code based on KopiLua, UniLua or Lua itself).

MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Loaders.​NamespaceDoc
internal static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Loaders.​NamespaceDoc

Namespace containing classes used to customized how scripts are loaded from external files.

MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Platforms.​NamespaceDoc
internal static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Platforms.​NamespaceDoc

Namespace containing classes used to customize how the interfacing with the operative system happens for the 'os' and 'io' modules, and for future modules/classes which may require OS access.  See IPlatformAccessor and ScriptGlobalOptions.Platform .

MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​REPL.​NamespaceDoc
internal static
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​REPL.​NamespaceDoc

Contains classes useful to implement REPL interpreters.  See : http://​en​.wikipedia​.org​/wiki​/Read%E2%80%93eval%E2%80%93print_loo​p
